column4: Running Ubuntu 9.04 64bit with a Sound Blaster Audigy 4. Sound works fine, but when I plug my headphones in my sound is quiet as a whisper (after I raise my volume meter to 100%). I have scoured all sound settings and everything is at 100%. Can anyone help?
make sure you are setting your output into "headphones" mode and not "line out" mode
usually this is a toggle called "output amplifier" or similar. enable it in the mixer (first enable to display it, then enable to use it)
